triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an adaptive backstepping control scheme, making this the core control methodology.

triples.name: Nonlinear system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses control of a class of nonlinear systems with unknown output modeling errors.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper develops a robust adaptive control scheme that adjusts to system parameters and disturbances.

triples.name: Robust control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a robust adaptive control scheme designed to handle modeling uncertainties.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: The paper uses Lyapunov-based stability analysis to establish the upper bound function for the output modeling error.

triples.name: Closed-loop controller
triples.relevance: The paper ensures all signals in the closed-loop control system remain bounded under the proposed scheme.
